meanings.definition: Skill or craftsmanship in a particular trade or craft.
meanings.sent1: Her artisanship in woodworking was evident in the intricate details of the hand-carved chair.
meanings.sent2: The artisanship of the handmade pottery was admired by all who saw it.
meanings.sent3: The artisanship of the chef was so exceptional that even the vegetables looked like works of art.
meanings.sent4: His artisanship with words painted vivid pictures in the minds of his readers.
meanings.sent5: The artisanship of the tailor transformed a simple piece of fabric into a stunning gown.

meanings.definition: The quality of being produced by skilled craftsmen.
meanings.sent1: The artisanship of the furniture reflected the dedication of the craftsmen who made it.
meanings.sent2: Customers appreciated the artisanship of the handmade jewelry for its uniqueness.
meanings.sent3: The artisanship of the cake decorator turned a plain cake into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The artisanship of the watchmaker was evident in the precision of each timepiece.
meanings.sent5: The artisanship of the blacksmith was showcased in the intricate iron gates.

meanings.definition: The practice of a skilled trade.
meanings.sent1: His artisanship as a carpenter was well-known in the small town.
meanings.sent2: The artisanship of the tailor was evident in the perfectly tailored suits.
meanings.sent3: The artisanship of the barista was evident in the beautiful latte art.
meanings.sent4: Her artisanship as a potter was showcased in the delicate teacups she created.
meanings.sent5: The artisanship of the mechanic was evident in the smooth running of the vintage car.
